name: Keep Your Pack Together
description:
Hachiko, one of the dog from you pack has gone missing and you as the alpha of your pack decide to bring him back.

This is a 2D platformer where you play as a dog trying to rescue one of the member of your pack. You control Shiro and Leo (dogs) simultaneously.  Shiro can run faster but Leo can Jump higher and push boxes around. Use their abilities to cross each level and save Hachiko.

How to play:

Move Left/Right - Left Arrow/Right Arrow or A/D key

Jump - Up Arrow/W/Space key

Switch camera - C key
